extension.name: System - MobileESP for Joomla
extension.author: Robert Gerald Porter, Anthony Hand
extension.copyright: Joomla Component authored by Robert Gerald Porter, The MobileESP Project is Copyright (C) 2010-2011 Anthony Hand
extension.description: MobileESP plugin for Joomla, detects smartphones to redirect to web app site or specific landing URL in Joomla.

field.name: appService
field.label: Mobile App Service
field.description: Select which mobile app service you are using.
field.option: Weever App (use settings from Weever Apps component)

field.name: forwardingEnabled
field.label: Mobile Forwarding
field.description: Forward any visitors to specified URL

field.name: forwardingUrl
field.label: Forwarding URL
field.description: URL to forward selected mobile users to.

field.name: devicesForwarded
field.label: Device Detection Functions Used
field.description: A comma-seperated list of detection functions from mdetect.php to run. If any one of them are correct, the device will forward to the forwarding URL.

field.name: webkitOnly
field.label: WebKit only
field.description: Forward only when WebKit browser is detected?
